ygData.subject: Re: Fiery Avenger really that good?
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually the 2 best classes for PVP are Cleric and Enchanter at high levels. In terms of melee, yes monks by leaps and bounds ... From: kurt walther
ygData.messageBody:
Actually the 2 best classes for PVP are Cleric and Enchanter at high levels.
In terms of melee, yes monks by leaps and bounds


-----Original Message-----
From: kurt walther <itzkurt@...>
To: EQCheats@onelist.com <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 12:47 AM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Fiery Avenger really that good?


>From: kurt walther <itzkurt@...>
>
>Fling, Kirby wrote:
>>
>> From: "Fling, Kirby" <FlingKirby@...>
>>
>> Hmm...
>>
>> Lets look at the comparisons, given the possible duals (with no
>> Lay-on-Hands)
>> Paladin with Fiery Avenger Vs. Monk? Monk will win.
>> Paladin with Fiery Avenger Vs. Warrior? Warrior will probably win.
>> Paladin with Fiery Avenger Vs. Ranger? Probably a toss up.
>>
>
>
>Necromancer vs any of those with any weapon.. Necro wins. Heh. Fact
>is that Necros (and enchanters too believe it or not) own in PvP at
>higher levels (low levels too for necros). I admit it too.. Paladins
>suck at higher lvls. No where near the tanks that monks or warriors
>are. No where near the healers that clerics are. The fiery avenger
>kinda brings them back up to standard. But in no means does it make
>them invincible.
>
